page.name: Prepare for Session 1.5
page.content:
The next synchronous session will focus on the concepts of cognitive demand and productive struggle. You will be engaging in a video case to explore how cognitively demanding tasks are supported through instructional practices to foster studentsâ€™ productive struggle. You will also be introduced to the concepts of mathematics identity and student agency.

To prepare for Session 1.5, complete the handout S-Pattern Task. If possible, print out the handout and do the problem there. Also consider the content standard(s) and mathematical practice(s) that this task addresses. Make sure to have your work handy during Session 1.5.
